title: Data Journalism: 2020 Campaign Events by Candidate and State
description: Here's an analysis showing the presidential candidates with the most campaign events during the 2020 election, in addition to a breakdown of the top 5 states where candidates hosted the most events.

title: Data Journalism: Consumer Complaints - Untimely Responses
description:
Here's an analysis of consumer complaints from March 2020 to December 2020 that did not receive timely responses. 
Source: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau

title: Welcome
contents: Welcome to my portfolio site! This site was originally created for SMPA 3230, Data Journalism, at GW.
